gameDetails.name: Alcatraz: The Scapegoat – Maximum Security
gameDetails.description:
Alcatraz: The Scapegoat - Maximum Security, the first expansion for KuÅºnia Gier's Spiel 2011 release Alcatraz: the Scapegoat, contains many new elements, including three new locations, one new character sheet (allowing for play with up to five people) and four new blackmail cards.

The expansion also introduces new mechanisms not present in the basic game:


    The Chief of Security, who can make the prisoners' life even harder than in the basic game.
    The Sucker, a character who cannot complete tasks but who in turn cannot be the scapegoat.
    Sentence cards that give your characters extra abilities.
